DOC.brief_summary: Trial design : An equivalence/non-inferiority randomize control trial parallel group design study effect two aerobic exercise-training intensity COPD patient-centered outcome . Methods : Thirty-four COPD clinically stable patient stratify mild severe GOLD stage , blind 60 80 % Wmax aerobic exercise training intensity outpatient pulmonary rehabilitation program , 2009-2010 . Outcomes assess St.George 's respiratory questionnaire ( primary outcome ) , Mahler dyspnea index , London Chest activity daily live scale , 6-minute walk , constant load incremental exercise test . Patient 's allocation sequence computer-generated , consignment safe deposit box .
DOC.brief_title: Pulmonary Rehabilitation COPD : Effects Two Aerobic Exercise Intensity Patient-centered Outcomes
DOC.criteria: Clinically stable COPD FEV1/FVC < 70 % Exercise training medical referral Unable attend 3times/week program Infectious disease Metastatic cancer Unstable heart disease Neuromusculoskeletal disorder Cognitive psychiatric disorder
